landing.heroTitle: Ideas snap into place. Crisp. Clean. OdoDocs.
landing.heroDescription: Documentation that feels satisfying to create. Every click, every edit—just right.

features.title: Real-time Collaboration
features.desc: Edit documents together with your team, instantly.

features.title: Block-based Editing
features.desc: Focus on content with a distraction-free, modern editor.

features.title: Smart Organization
features.desc: Keep everything structured with nested workspaces and folders.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Log in to access your workspace.

signup.title: Create a workspace account
signup.subtitle: Sign up to create amazing documents.

auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired or you have been logged out due to inactivity. Please log in again.

workspace.heroSubtitle: Manage documents, members, and exports across every workspace.
workspace.galleryHint: Pick a workspace to open its documents and teams.
workspace.creationSubtitle: Spin up a new workspace for your next project.
workspace.selectedWorkspaceHint: Select a workspace to see its documents and members.
workspace.workspaceListHint: Click a workspace to jump into its documents.
workspace.selectorHint: Select a workspace to explore documents, members, and settings.
workspace.noWorkspaces: No workspaces yet. Create one to get started.
workspace.membersRestricted: Only owners or admins can view member lists.
workspace.closeWarning: Closing removes the workspace for everyone. This action is permanent.
workspace.onboardingDescription: Create a workspace to gather documents, members, and activity in one place.
workspace.onboardingHint: Workspaces help teams organize content and permissions.
workspace.membersHint: Only workspace owners or admins can manage members.
workspace.selectWorkspaceMessage: Select a workspace from the left to start working.
workspace.confirmDeletionBody: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
workspace.settingsAccessRestricted: Only workspace owners or admins can change workspace settings.
workspace.settingsAccessRestrictedDetail: You do not have permission to edit these settings.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.name: Name
dashboard.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.createWorkspaceDialogDescription: Give your workspace a name. You can change this later.
dashboard.noRecentDocumentsNoWorkspace: No recent documents. Create a workspace to get started.

global.title: Account Settings
global.legalNameRequired: Full name must be at least 1 character.

workspaceProfile.title: {workspaceName} workspace profile
workspaceProfile.workspaceSpecific: Workspace-only settings. Change email/password in global account settings.
workspaceProfile.workspaceSpecificDesc: These settings apply ONLY to the {workspaceName} workspace.
workspaceProfile.emailPasswordHint: To change your email or password, visit
workspaceProfile.displayNameHelper: How you appear to others in this workspace

slashHelp.title: 빠른 도움말
slashHelp.description: `/` 입력 후 키워드를 입력하면 원하는 블록을 빠르게 삽입할 수 있습니다.
slashHelp.noResults: 일치하는 항목이 없습니다. 다른 검색어를 시도해 보세요.

landing.heroDescription: 복잡한 문서도 경쾌하게. 클릭 한 번, 타이핑 한 줄이 기분 좋게 맞아떨어집니다.

features.title: 블록 기반 편집
features.desc: 방해 없는 모던 에디터로 콘텐츠에 집중하세요.

features.title: 스마트한 정리
features.desc: 중첩된 워크스페이스와 폴더로 모든 것을 체계적으로 관리하세요.

auth.sessionExpired: 세션이 만료되었거나 오랫동안 사용하지 않아 자동으로 로그아웃되었습니다. 다시 로그인해 주세요.

workspace.creationSubtitle: 새 프로젝트를 위한 공간을 바로 시작하세요.
workspace.selectorHint: 문서, 멤버, 설정을 확인할 워크스페이스를 선택하세요.

workspace.closeWarning: 이 작업은 되돌릴 수 없으며 모든 사용자가 이용할 수 없게 됩니다.
workspace.onboardingDescription: 워크스페이스를 생성해 문서, 멤버, 활동을 한 곳에서 관리하세요.
workspace.onboardingHint: 워크스페이스는 팀과 문서 세트를 구분하는 단위입니다.
workspace.membersHint: 소유자나 관리자만 멤버를 관리할 수 있습니다.
workspace.confirmDeletionBody: "{name}"을(를) 삭제하시겠습니까? 이 작업은 되돌릴 수 없습니다.
workspace.settingsAccessRestricted: 워크스페이스 설정은 Owner나 Admin만 변경할 수 있습니다.
workspace.settingsAccessRestrictedDetail: 현재 계정에는 이 설정을 수정할 권한이 없습니다.

dashboard.name: 이름

landing.heroTitle: サクサク整う、気持ちいい文書作成。
landing.heroDescription: 複雑な思考も、心地よくまとまる。クリック一つ、入力一行が、ぴたりと決まります。
landing.featureIntro: この心地よさ、体験してください。

features.title: リアルタイムコラボレーション
features.desc: チームと瞬時にドキュメントを共同編集できます。

features.title: ブロックベースの編集
features.desc: 気が散らないモダンなエディタでコンテンツに集中できます。

features.title: スマートな整理整頓
features.desc: ネストされたワークスペースとフォルダですべてを構造化して管理します。
